poke around.translation[0].definitions[0: to look for something, especially by moving a lot of things around
James began poking about in the cupboard, looking for the sugar.
poke around.translation[0].definitions[1: to try to find out information about other peopleâ€™s private lives, business etc, in a way that annoys them
Stop poking around in my business!
poke around.translation[0].definitions[2: to spend time in shops, markets etc looking at nothing in particular
I spent Sunday afternoon poking around an old bookshop.
